Class LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends IrisController<User>
    LoginController helps the activity interact with the database by separating its concern of handling the asynchronous calls to authenticate fields

    • Method Detail

      • loginUser

        public void loginUser(java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      Callback cb)
        loginUser is a method to asynchronously check the database for existing user and authenticate it will trigger a callback when we receive a response with a result boolean success or not
        Parameters:
        email - User email
        password - User password
        cb - Callback method

      • fetchAllUserData

        public void fetchAllUserData(Callback callback)
        Get all aggregate data of the User from elasticsearch (e.g. all Problems, Records, photos) and bind it to the current user
